ABOUT THE COLLEGE:
The B.M.S. Organization of Technology [BMSIT], is a private building school in Bangalore, Karnataka, India associated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belgaum. It was established by B S Narayana, child of educationist B M Sreenivasaiah, and is overseen by the B M S Educational Trust. It is the sister foundation of B M S College of Engineering, an entrenched government helped designing school in India. B M S Institute of Technology is perceived as a Research Center by VTU. B M S Institute of Technology is situated on SH-9, KA, a little separation far from Bangalore, in an open and meagerly populated and constructed territory, known as Avalahalli. At first, beginning with five controls of designing, viz., Electronics and Communication, Computer Science, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Telecommunications Engineering, Mechanical Engineering,information science, the school offers a Bachelor of Engineering certificate in Information Science, and a Bachelor of Architecture degree, notwithstanding Bachelor of Engineering degrees in the five previously mentioned orders. The school was allowed the status of a Research Institution by the Visvesvaraya Technological University in 2005.The branch of arrangement and preparing is perceived for its capacity to plan and execute esteem included projects, for example, the identity preparing, Technical preparing, Bridge courses in the territories of intrigue and prerequisites by the business. This adds to the certifications of the understudies and upgrades the nature of things to come building experts from our school. Situation cell is occupied with preparing understudies from first semester itself.
The Placement cell at BMSIT works intimately with the arrangement office at BMSCE to give wide vocation openings through different presumed organizations for grounds enrollment. The school currently gloats of having delivered more than 2,400 designers dispersed all over the globe.
